settings.title: Vitamins that treat you right—a delicious daily ritual.

settings.subtitle: Sup·ple·ment: Something that completes or enhances something else when added to it.
settings.content:
We believe real, minimally processed food is the best source of nutrients. Made with only clean, plant based ingredients, our vitamin infused dark chocolate bites were designed to make caring for yourself a treat.


We chose chocolate because it’s a whole food with natural properties that make it a great delivery system for vitamins. A prebiotic, cocoa helps good bacteria grow in the gut and enhances the body’s ability to absorb nutrients. 


Supplementing should be fun for everyone. We’re here to support you in your wellness journey with delicious bites that enrich your life from the moment you eat them.
